title: cant transfer my account
body:
when i go to  "account" in the ingame shop i cant buy a transfer. 
some people said that you cant purchase a transfer until november but i still cant do it.
if you know something about it please write it here :)
ty

replies.body: ^ this. We're trying to provide updates as quickly as possible, and you're welcome to submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if anything new comes up to help, but at this time the transfers through the client likely won't come back for a few more weeks.

Please... try to deny the fact that It's about money. The focus is on christmas season instead of trying to fulfill the commitment they made when throwing 20th nov as a date for enabling transfers again

Its because Riot is a fucking piece of shit team. With shit matchmaking, shit mmr system. Take me back to season 3-4 before the dynamic SHIT QUEUE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
